summary: ResearchMorpho VaultsGovernanceDocsBlogJobsFAQ - Morpho is an open platform that allows users to earn yield, borrow assets, curate markets and vaults, and build applications. It offers secure, simple, and efficient services with better rates, higher collateralization factors, and lower gas costs than existing platforms. Users can earn, borrow, and build on Morpho, with curated risk, better yield, and transparency. The platform also features Morpho Optimizers for optimizing yield and borrowing costs. The ecosystem includes various projects and emphasizes industry-leading security practices with multiple audits and formal verification. Users can participate in Morpho governance to propose and discuss changes.
